metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12791 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in minion id validation in SaltStack Saltbefore 2016.11.7 and 2017.7.x before 2017.7.1 allows remote minions withincorrect credentials to authenticate to a master via a crafted minion ID.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
